trends: There have been no other sightings in Jalgaon
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am doing my home work at that night, about 2 am at 2 Feb 2013 i just get out my room for relax my legs. i drink water by glass and just see toward the sky. I thought that is Airplane, I just wave my hands towards it just for my enjoyment. But i did not think what will happen next ! the object is going near about plane height, suddenly it comes about 300 ft on my head, there are 4 lights on its surface and 1 midal light, the midal light have leaser beam, i don't know it is leaser or not but it is red. the beam comes on my both eyes. its very terrific, i cant explain it on mail, i don't know English very well. the light is like 3d view. The object dose not have any sound. I means engine sound is not there. i really fill very afraid to revise that moment now . i wear a nighty at that night, in my pocket there is my Samsung cell phone, when the object is on my head it was continuously vibrating, till 2 mints. the light is on my eye near about two minute. the main thing is that my cell phone battery was fully charge at 1.15 am and when the object is gone after 2 minute my cell phone battery have only 1 line of charging. I fill very seek and my hand and legs are shaking. I never told this incident to any one. because people never believe on me. After 2 weeks 22 Feb 2013 at 2.15 I sleep very hard because i am very tired, about 2.15 my cell phone is vibrating continuously, I wake up and see toward it the mobile screen having a flashing, I suddenly revise 2 Feb's Incident and I open the door and look towards the sky and the object is there, it is searching some thing that night, the 4 white light are search on ground, and sudden they come on me and i got short time blindness for a moment. my phone continuously vibrating, now the I can face the Red light, i think they want to show me something, a shadow like image is printed on my mind and the light is off, and the flying object is gone. I am very afraid then, for few days i spend my night on my friends room, I told him that i fear to sleep alone. I don't no what kind of object is that. But i need your Help,! After that moment I change my room, i thought i am free from the object but it is not very easy to escape from it, 12 June 2013, 3.10 am, I am in my new room, at 3.10 am i wake up and go to the washroom, when i come out I saw the same flashing at sky, I feared and go to the room, my friends are sleep very deep, i saw towards my sell phone and pick up it. and put my had near to the window , the soft vibration is get started and it getting bigger slowly. I notice that my cell phone, the Bluetooth is on, i off my sell phone's Bluetooth, the vibration is stop and the flashing lights are still in the sky, the stop 5 mints in the sky and get away. I saw the 2 images clearly. I sketch the object on paper that time. It is related to the Bluetooth, and mobile. They also search me after 4 moths, i don't know why. ? please help me i really afraid. 21.0100��� N, 75.5667��� E are my city latitude and longitude .
